splashscreen.hide

Dismiss the splash screen.

navigator.splashscreen.hide();

Description

This method dismisses the application’s splash screen.

Supported Platforms

  • Amazon Fire OS
  • Android
  • BlackBerry 10
  • iOS
  • Windows Phone 7 and 8
  • Windows 8

Quick Example

navigator.splashscreen.hide();

Full Example

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
  <head>
    <title>Splashscreen Example</title>

    <script type="text/javascript" charset="utf-8" src="cordova.js"></script>
    <script type="text/javascript" charset="utf-8">

    // Wait for device API libraries to load
    //
    document.addEventListener("deviceready", onDeviceReady, false);

    // device APIs are available
    //
    function onDeviceReady() {
        navigator.splashscreen.hide();
    }

    </script>
  </head>
  <body>
    <h1>Example</h1>
  </body>
</html>

BlackBerry 10 Quirk

The config.xml file’s AutoHideSplashScreen setting must be false.

iOS Quirk

The config.xml file’s AutoHideSplashScreen setting must be false. To delay hiding the splash screen for two seconds, add a timer such as the following in the [deviceready](../events/events.deviceready.html) event handler:

    setTimeout(function() {
        navigator.splashscreen.hide();
    }, 2000);
